verses.verse: Moreover the spirit <WH7307> lifted <WH5375> me up, and brought <WH935> me to the east <WH6931> gate <WH8179> of the LORD's <WH3068> house, <WH1004> which looks <WH6437> eastward: <WH6921> and behold <WH2009> at the door <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> men; <WH376> among <WH8432> whom I saw <WH7200> Jaazaniah <WH2970> the son <WH1121> of Azur, <WH5809> and Pelatiah <WH6410> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah, <WH1141> princes <WH8269> of the people. <WH5971>

Then said <WH559> he to me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> these <WH428> are the men <WH582> that devise <WH2803> mischief, <WH205> and give wicked <WH7451> counsel <WH6098> in this <WH2063> city: <WH5892>
Which say, <WH559> It is not near; <WH7138> let us build <WH1129> houses: <WH1004> this <WH1931> city is the caldron, <WH5518> and we be the flesh. <WH1320>
Therefore <WH3651> prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> them, prophesy, <WH5012> O son <WH1121> of man. <WH120>

And the Spirit <WH7307> of the LORD <WH3068> fell <WH5307> on me, and said <WH559> to me, Speak; <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> Thus <WH3651> have you said, <WH559> O house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> for I know <WH3045> the things that come <WH4609> into your mind, <WH7307> every one of them.
You have multiplied <WH7235> your slain <WH2491> in this <WH2063> city, <WH5892> and you have filled <WH4390> the streets <WH2351> thereof with the slain. <WH2491>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Your slain <WH2491> whom <WH834> you have laid <WH7760> in the middle <WH8432> of it, they are the flesh, <WH1320> and this <WH1931> city is the caldron: <WH5518> but I will bring <WH3318> you forth <WH3318> out of the middle <WH8432> of it.
You have feared <WH3372> the sword; <WH2719> and I will bring <WH935> a sword <WH2719> on you, said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
And I will bring <WH3318> you out of the middle <WH8432> thereof, and deliver <WH5414> you into the hands <WH3027> of strangers, <WH2114> and will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> among you.
You shall fall <WH5307> by the sword; <WH2719> I will judge <WH8199> you in the border <WH1366> of Israel; <WH3478> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>
This <WH1931> city shall not be your caldron, <WH5518> neither shall you be the flesh <WH1320> in the middle <WH8432> thereof; but I will judge <WH8199> you in the border <WH1366> of Israel: <WH3478>

And you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD: <WH3068> for you have not walked <WH1980> in my statutes, <WH2706> neither <WH3808> executed <WH6213> my judgments, <WH4941> but have done <WH6213> after the manners <WH4941> of the heathen <WH1471> that are round <WH5439> about you.

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when I prophesied, <WH5012> that Pelatiah <WH6410> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah <WH1141> died. <WH4191> Then fell <WH5307> I down on my face, <WH6440> and cried <WH2199> with a loud <WH1419> voice, <WH6963> and said, <WH559> Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD! <WH3069> will you make <WH6213> a full end <WH3615> of the remnant <WH7611> of Israel? <WH3478>
Again the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> your brothers, <WH251> even your brothers, <WH251> the men <WH582> of your kindred, <WH1353> and all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> wholly, <WH3605> are they to whom <WH834> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> have said, <WH559> Get you far <WH7368> from the LORD: <WH3068> to us is this <WH1931> land <WH776> given <WH5414> in possession. <WH4181>

Therefore <WH3651> say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Although <WH3588> I have cast <WH7368> them far <WH7368> off among the heathen, <WH1471> and although <WH272> I have scattered <WH6327> them among the countries, <WH776> yet will I be to them as a little <WH4592> sanctuary <WH4720> in the countries <WH776> where <WH834> <WH8033> they shall come. <WH935>

Therefore <WH3651> say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I will even gather <WH6908> you from the people, <WH5971> and assemble <WH622> you out of the countries <WH776> where <WH834> you have been scattered, <WH6327> and I will give <WH5414> you the land <WH127> of Israel. <WH3478>

And they shall come <WH935> thither, <WH8033> and they shall take <WH5493> away <WH5493> all <WH3605> the detestable <WH8251> things thereof and all <WH3605> the abominations <WH8441> thereof from there.

And I will give <WH5414> them one <WH259> heart, <WH3820> and I will put <WH5414> a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you; and I will take <WH5493> the stony <WH68> heart <WH3820> out of their flesh, <WH1320> and will give <WH5414> them an heart <WH3820> of flesh: <WH1320>
That they may walk <WH3212> in my statutes, <WH2708> and keep <WH8104> my ordinances, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them: and they shall be my people, <WH5971> and I will be their God. <WH430>

But as for them whose heart <WH3820> walks <WH1980> after the heart <WH3820> of their detestable <WH8251> things and their abominations, <WH8441> I will recompense <WH5414> their way <WH1870> on their own heads, <WH7218> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

Then did the cherubim <WH3742> lift <WH5375> up their wings, <WH3671> and the wheels <WH212> beside <WH5980> them; and the glory <WH3519> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> was over <WH5921> them above. <WH4605>

And the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> went <WH5927> up from the middle <WH8432> of the city, <WH5892> and stood <WH5975> on the mountain <WH2022> which <WH834> is on the east <WH6924> side <WH6924> of the city. <WH5892>

Afterwards the spirit <WH7307> took <WH5375> me up, and brought <WH935> me in a vision <WH4758> by the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> into Chaldea, <WH3778> to them of the captivity. <WH1473> So the vision <WH4758> that I had seen <WH7200> went <WH5927> up from me.
Then I spoke <WH1696> to them of the captivity <WH1473> all <WH3605> the things <WH1697> that the LORD <WH3068> had showed <WH7200> me.
